markdownRemark.html:
Success is Not the Goal

What is true north? Success is not the destination Because what comes after that? Happiness? If success is a pit stop on the way to happiness, why not have that now? Everyone is able to achieve that now, privilege not needed.
Be grateful for what you have. You have many things that you probably take for granted. Things a past version of yourself craved.

When you can truly see what you already have, you will realize you already have enough. And that my friend, is happiness.
